00002 * Module Name: globals.h

00004 * Copyright (c) 1985 - 1999, Microsoft Corporation
00005 *
00006 * This module contains all the server's global variables
00007 * One must be executing on the server's context to manipulate
00008 * any of these variables or call any of these functions.  Serializing access
00009 * to them is also a good idea.
00010 *
00011 * History:
00012 * 10-15-90 DarrinM      Created.
